(https://www.dimsumdaily.hk/foreign-man-smears-his-saliva-on-mtr-handrail/)
由於佢係基金經理，所以設計咗2封投訴電郵。第一封俾證監會(SFC)，第二封俾佢間基金公司 Solitude Limited 嘅投訴主任 (Complaints Officer)。

1) 俾證監會嘅投訴email:

To: complaint@sfc.hk
Subject: Complaint against Mr. Joel David WERNER for his unacceptable behaviour in public that has brought the industry into disrepute

Dear SFC,

I am writing to complain about the conduct of Mr. Joel David WERNER (CE. No. BGD861), the Responsible Officer of Solitude Limited (BGD867).

On 18 March 2020, Joel was seen as to have licked his fingers and wiping them on to an MTR train's handrail. This is a very disgusting and irresponsible behaviour amid the current corona virus outbreak, and would contribute to the spread of the virus and is putting the public's health and wellbeing into serious risks. It is very surprising that a Responsible Officer of a Licensed Corporation would have behaved in such reckless manner, and this has put the securities industry into disrepute. 

I believe the SFC should look into this matter, take due consideration into whether Joel could still be regarded as fit and proper, and consider appropriate actions against him having regard to his unacceptable behaviour.   

Regards,
（大佬你嘅名）

2) 比佢公司嘅投訴email:

To: lucy@solitidecap.com
Subject: Complaint against Joel Werner for his unacceptable behaviour

Dear Solitude Limited Complaints Officer,

I am writing to complain about the conduct of Joel Werner, the Chief Investment Officer and Responsible Officer of Solitude Limited.

On 18 March 2020, Joel was seen as to have licked his fingers and wiping them onto an MTR train's handrail. This is a very disgusting and irresponsible behaviour amid the current corona virus outbreak, and would contribute to the spread of the virus and is putting general public's health and well-being into serious risk.  It is very surprising that a Responsible Officer of a Licensed Corporation would have behaved in such reckless manner.  This has put your Firm, and the asset management profession into disrepute. 

I believe the Firm should look into this matter seriously, take due consideration into whether Joel could still be regarded as fit and proper, and take appropriate disciplinary actions against him for his unacceptable behaviour.

I look forward to your reply.

Regards,
（大佬你嘅名）

感激大佬
